member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgElement
member.summary: Specifies an SVG element which can be part of an SVG document.

remarks.p: An SVG element can be assigned to a different document than the one it was created with, but any document it's assigned to needs to share the same device as the element.
